price: Da wata itãciya,* tanã fita daga dũtsin Sainã'a, tanã tsira da man shãfãwa, da man miya dõmin masu cĩ.
arabic: وَشَجَرَةٗ تَخۡرُجُ مِن طُورِ سَيۡنَآءَ تَنۢبُتُ بِٱلدُّهۡنِ وَصِبۡغٖ لِّلۡأٓكِلِينَ
footnotes: * Itãciyar Zaitũni. Ita ce itãciyar farko da ta tsira a kan ƙasa a bãyan Ɗũfãna tanã rãyuwa mai dõgon lõkaci; an ce tanã rãyuwa kamar shekara dubũ huɗu. Anã cin 'ya'yanta, anã man shãfãwa da su, kuma anã yin miya dasu. Asalin sibg, rini dõmin tanã rina lõmar tuwo. Dũtsen Sĩnã'a mai albarka, ɗũr, shĩ ne dũtSe mai itãce a kansa.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: washajaratan takhruju min ṭūri saynāa tanbutu bil-duh'ni waṣib'ghin lil'ākilīna
